markdownRemark.html:
Hi, I'm Henrik, a Computer Engineer, focusing on software development to help organisations solve problems and deliver value.

I was born 1967, grow up outside Gävle and after University studies I moved to Stockholm for my first job at LM Ericsson Data Services AB, 1989, and hey did I progresses as a C and Assembler developer.

I have been in the software development business for 30 years, built my first intranet site 1999 and thus have over 20 years of experience developing for the web and I consider myself as a experienced developer when it comes to HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Web API and frameworks and tools.

I have a daughter and three grandchildren living in England while I live in a town named Sigtuna, 40 minutes drive from Stockholm, the capital of Sweden.

As a person I'm passioned about topics I love, want to have challenges in my life and always strives to improve my skills as a developer. I think I'm a social person, fast learner with an ability to adapt to changed situations and different people. At least I do my best. :-)

My main interest apart from JavaScript, is sports. Today I love competing in golf and when I was much younger I was seriously good in Tennis.
